# Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) Spectrometer based Aviator's Breathing Oxygen Test Systems

## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01021637
* Solicitation Number: W8486-195218/B
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-25T14:00:00

### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of Aviator's Breathing Oxygen Test Systems based on Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) Spectrometers. This contract aims to provide a solution for testing the purity and composition of oxygen used by aviators.

### Contract Requirements

* Estimated Quantity of Commodity: Refer to the attached Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Duration of Contract: Seven years after contract award date

### Trade Agreements

This tender announcement is open to companies operating under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

* Worldwide

### Regions of Delivery

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* British Columbia
* Alberta

### Covered Products and Services

The tender announcement covers the provision of Aviator's Breathing Oxygen Test Systems based on FTIR Spectrometers, including the necessary software, training, and maintenance.

### Contractor Requirements

The successful contractor will be required to

* Provide a comprehensive solution that meets the Department of National Defence's specifications
* Ensure the quality and reliability of the test systems
* Provide training and maintenance services for the test systems
